content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great place to live. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the size and location of the apartment, I would say that a fair price would be around 700 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's an interesting proposal, Max. I'll consider it. Would you be willing to pay a higher deposit to secure the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm willing to pay a higher deposit, but I don't want to pay more than 25% of the monthly rent as a deposit. In this case, it would be 175 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concern regarding the deposit, Max. However, I must inform you that due to the high demand for apartments in the city center, I am looking for a tenant who can afford a higher deposit. I'm sorry, but I cannot accept your offer with the current deposit amount. If you are willing to increase the deposit, we can continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, I am willing to pay a deposit of 300 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a more reasonable offer, Max. I appreciate your willingness to increase the deposit. Now, let's talk about the rent. Would you be able to pay 750 euros per month? This is still a competitive price for the area, considering the amenities and location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 euros is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay 720 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I see that you're trying to negotiate, Max, and I appreciate that. However, my goal is to get the best possible price for my apartment. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at 735 euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 730 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but I cannot accept that price. I'm looking for a tenant who can afford to pay at least 750 euros per month. If you're unable to meet that price, I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, Max. If you change your mind or if you're willing to reconsider your offer, please let me know. Until then, I'll consider other potential tenants who may be able to meet my asking price. Thank you for your time.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
